[Groovy] Class GWTCompiler

java.lang.Object
  GWTCompiler

class GWTCompiler

Manage GWT Compilation. Remove from scripting environment to give more opportunity to use threading when this is appropriate

findModules

java.lang.Object findModules(java.lang.String searchDir, boolean entryPointOnly = true)
Searches a given directory for any GWT module files, and returns a list of their fully-qualified names.
Parameters:
searchDir - A string path specifying the directory to search in.
entryPointOnly - Whether to find modules that contains entry-points (ie. GWT clients)
Returns:
a list of fully-qualified module names.
